CatDescriptText: Frank Taylor, laborer, Third Ward, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column, published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 10, 1962, pg. 11  with question: "Do you think a shorter work week is the answer to the job loss posed by automation?" Answer reads: "Yes, I think so, because the shorter week would be welcome by those working and would give work to the unemployed."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Frank Taylor wearing fedora and tweed coat, standing in front of building
